name: Hull Event Attribution Processor
description: A connector to use events for attribution of user and account profiles

private_settings.name: whitelisted_events
private_settings.title: Process users and linked accounts when one of the following events has been recorded
private_settings.description: By default no events will be processed and the connector will not perform any attribution

private_settings.name: gist_id
private_settings.title: Enter the identifier of your Gist
private_settings.description: The identifier is only the UUID part of the url, e.g.`8975a7192e4c3ee0a4ed64a5d552bd29` for `https://gist.github.com/hull/8975a7192e4c3ee0a4ed64a5d552bd29`
